pageContent:
VagdeviK 
Email:  vagdevi.kapilavai@gmail.com 
Phone: 248 761 3677 
 
 
Professional Summary 
 
Highly skilled QA professional with 9+ years of experience in Software Testing and Quality 
Assurance, specializing in both Manual and Automation Testing. Proven expertise in test 
planning, UI/API automation, performance testing, and test leadership across Agile and 
Waterfall environments. Adept at building robust test frameworks, implementing quality gates, 
and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products. 
 
Technical Skills 
 
Testing Methodologies: 
Functional Testing, Regression Testing, Integration Testing, Validation Testing, UAT, End-to-
End Testing, Cross-Browser Testing, Performance Testing 
 
Automation Tools: 
Selenium WebDriver, Playwright, Appium, MS Test, SpecFlow, TestNG, Junit 
 
API Testing Tools: 
RestAssured, Postman, SoapUI, Insomnia 
 
Performance Testing Tools: 
JMeter, K6 
 
Languages & Frameworks:

API Testing Tools: 
RestAssured, Postman, SoapUI, Insomnia 
 
Performance Testing Tools: 
JMeter, K6 
 
Languages & Frameworks: 
C#, Java, TypeScript, HTML, XML, Gherkin 
 
Source Control & CI/CD: 
GitHub, Bitbucket, SourceTree, Jenkins, CircleCI 
 
Monitoring & Cloud Tools: 
Kubernetes, Rancher, AWS, Dynatrace, Splunk, Grafana 
 
Project/Defect Management Tools: 
JIRA, TFS, Azure DevOps, Rally, ALM 
 
Collaboration Tools: 
Confluence, SharePoint, MS Excel 
 
Databases: 
SQL Developer, PL/SQL, TOAD, Strong SQL query writing and database validation.

Certifications 
 
• ISTQB Certified – Indian Testing Board 
• Career Essentials in Generative AI – Microsoft 
• Angular Essential Training – LinkedIn 
• GitHub Copilot Training 
 
 
 
 
Education 
 
Master of Computer Application 
Kakatiya University, India 
 
 
 
 
 
Professional Experience 
 
 
Rocket Mortgage – Detroit, MI 
Quality Engineer 
April 2020 – Present 
 
Responsibilities:  
 
• Analyzed system requirements, developed end-to-end test plans, and executed test cases       
with detailed documentation.  
• Collaborated in an Agile/Scrum environment with product management teams to develop 
comprehensive test suites.  
• Executed both manual and automated tests according to detailed test plans and logged 
defects in tracking tools. 
• Created and executed test scripts for API testing using C# and MS Test framework. 
• Developed and maintained UI automation frameworks and test scripts using Playwright 
and Selenium WebDriver

• Created and executed test scripts for API testing using C# and MS Test framework. 
• Developed and maintained UI automation frameworks and test scripts using Playwright 
and Selenium WebDriver 
• Integrated the regression tests in Circle CI\CD pipeline  
• Performed testing in Kubernetes environments, including pod scaling and logs for 
services. 
• Developed load and performance tests using JMeter and K6 tool 
• Led the creation and management of test cases, plans and suits in Azure DevOps. 
• Scheduled Jobs and Generating test reports using Circle CI\CD pipeline  
• Trained and mentored team members and interns 
• Led QA initiatives, promoting best practices and implementing quality gates across the 
development lifecycle to uphold code quality and prevent defects early.

Nexient 
Ann Arbor, MI  
Senior Test Engineer 
Jan 2019 - Mar 2020  
 
 Responsibilities:  
 
• Develop detailed test plans and test cases based on functional and non-functional 
requirements.   
• Document test cases clearly with steps, expected results, and actual results. 
• Evaluate and maintain existing manual and automated test cases & procedures. 
• Execute manual and automated test cases as per the test plans. 
• Design, develop, maintain, and execute automated test scripts using appropriate tools like 
Selenium. 
• Integrate automated tests into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) 
pipelines for efficient testing. 
• Created Mobile testing scripts using Appium tool. 
• Track and report quality assurance metrics such as defect densities, open defect counts, 
and test coverage. 
• Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including developers, product 
managers, and business analysts.

and test coverage. 
• Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including developers, product 
managers, and business analysts. 
• Communicate test progress, test results, and quality metrics to stakeholders.

Mastek Ltd., Mumbai, India  
Test Engineer 
Nov 2008 – July 2011 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• As a member of the billing group, I have been involved in the following tasks: 
• Analyzing and Understanding System Requirement Specification. 
• Analyzing the user requirements and acceptance criteria and developed, maintained, 
executed the Test cases in QTP/UFT. 
• Integrating QTP/UFT with the HP ALM and running the test cases through ALM and 
distributing the test results throughout the team. 
• Developing automation scripts for GUI testing of the software. 
• Participation in Test Planning meetings. 
• Preparing Build Verification Test (BVT), check list and other testing documents.  
• Creating, managing and executing Test cases and Test suites. 
• Performing Functional testing, usability testing and Browser Compatibility testing during 
different phases of application development. 
• Filing bugs in Rational Clear Quest and generating bug reports to the development team

different phases of application development. 
• Filing bugs in Rational Clear Quest and generating bug reports to the development team 
and management for follow up. 
• Track Bugs to their closure. 
• Performing Regression testing and executing Build Verification Test (BVT) for ensuring 
the stability of the application before release for every enhancement or changes. 
• Update the project status to the Leads and Manager on a timely basis.
